1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"Fatimah bint Abi Hubaish came to the Messenger of Allah and said: 'O Messenger of Allah! I am a woman who bleeds continuously and never becomes pure, should I give up the prayer?' He said: 'No, rather that is a vein and it is not menstruation. When the time of your period comes, leave off the prayer, and when it is over, take a bath and wash the blood from yourself and perform the prayer." This is the Hadith of Waki

chapter.ara-name: باب ما جاء في المستحاضة التي قد عدت أيام أقرائها قبل أن يستمر بها الدم
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the non-menstrually bleeding woman who has counted the days of her period before her flow of blood became continuous
